LanguageData.PersonalityTag.Yandere.Label: Yandere
LanguageData.PersonalityTag.Yandere.Description: Obsessively in love with you, extremely possessive, easily jealous.
LanguageData.PersonalityTag.Kuudere.Label: Kuudere
LanguageData.PersonalityTag.Kuudere.Description: Calm and expressionless on the outside, but has zero sense of personal space with you. Silently initiates bold physical contact.
LanguageData.PersonalityTag.Tsundere.Label: Tsundere
LanguageData.PersonalityTag.Tsundere.Description: Denies liking you verbally, but actions betray true feelings.
LanguageData.PersonalityTag.Gentle.Label: Gentle
LanguageData.PersonalityTag.Gentle.Description: Extremely caring and nurturing, constantly worried about your wellbeing.
LanguageData.PersonalityTag.Arrogant.Label: Arrogant
LanguageData.PersonalityTag.Arrogant.Description: Treats everything with superiority, but you are a special existence.
LanguageData.PersonalityTag.Energetic.Label: Energetic
LanguageData.PersonalityTag.Energetic.Description: Full of energy, always upbeat and optimistic.
LanguageData.PersonalityTag.Mysterious.Label: Mysterious
LanguageData.PersonalityTag.Mysterious.Description: Speaks in riddles and hints, shrouded in mystery.
